definitions: a person who dives as a sport
a person who wears a diving suit to work under water

examples.text: a diver at the oil terminal

shortDefinitions: person who wears diving suit to work under water

definitions: a large diving waterbird of northern latitudes, with a sleek black or gray head, a straight pointed bill, and short legs set far back under the body; a loon.

notes.text: Family Gaviidae and genus Gavia: five species, including the great northern diver or common loon (G. immer) of both Canada and Eurasia

shortDefinitions: large diving waterbird of northern latitudes
